jd: From: Manish Kumar, Scalable Systems manish.kumar@scalable-systems.com Reply to: manish.kumar@scalable-systems.com Position: Senior Python Development and L3 support exp.Location: Plano, TXExpertise as a Python Developer with primary skills of Oracle and Java.Unix Scripting is an add-on.Understating of the on-premises Infrastructure and AWS architecture and ability to work in Cloud migration projects from existing on Premise environments.Handling Python and Java applications and providing L3 level support.Hands on experience in UNIX is also preferred.• knowledge of SSL/TLS certificates and renewal.• Idea about load balancing and networking troubleshooting.• Knowledge of Dynatrace or any monitoring tool.• Knowledge of AutoSys or any scheduler configuration.• Understating the Treasury and funding business.
